‰æãÂ≠êÔºöÈº†Ê†á‰ªé div#target ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁßªÂá∫Êó∂ËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂà§Êñ≠ÈÄªËæëÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

<div id="target"><span>test</span></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var target = document.getElementById('target');
if (target.addEventListener) {
  target.addEventListener('mouseout', mouseoutHandler, false);
} else if (target.attachEvent) {
  target.attachEvent('onmouseout', mouseoutHandler);
}

function mouseoutHandler(e) {
  e = e || window.event;
  var target = e.target || e.srcElement;

  // Âà§Êñ≠ÁßªÂá∫Èº†Ê†áÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫ÁõÆÊ†áÂÖÉÁ¥†
  if (target.id !== 'target') {
    return;
  }

  // Âà§Êñ≠Èº†Ê†áÊòØÁßªÂá∫ÂÖÉÁ¥†ËøòÊòØÁßªÂà∞Â≠êÂÖÉÁ¥†
  var relatedTarget = event.relatedTarget || e.toElement;
  while (relatedTarget !== target
    && relatedTarget.nodeName.toUpperCase() !== 'BODY') {
    relatedTarget = relatedTarget.parentNode;
  }

  // Â¶ÇÊûúÁõ∏Á≠âÔºåËØ¥ÊòéÈº†Ê†áÂú®ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂÜÖÈÉ®ÁßªÂä®
  if (relatedTarget === target) {
    return;
  }

  // ÊâßË°åÈúÄË¶ÅÊìç‰Ωú
  //alert('Èº†Ê†áÁßªÂá∫');

}
</script>

ÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´ØÂ≠òÂÇ® localStorage Âíå sessionStorage

  • ÂêåÊ∫êÊñáÊ°£ÂèØ‰ª•ËØªÂèñÂπ∂‰øÆÊîπ localStorage Êï∞ÊçÆÔºåsessionStorage Âè™ÂÖÅËÆ∏Âêå‰∏Ä‰∏™Á™óÂè£‰∏ãÁöÑÊñáÊ°£ËÆøÈóÆÔºåÂ¶ÇÈÄöËøá iframe ÂºïÂÖ•ÁöÑÂêåÊ∫êÊñáÊ°£„ÄÇ

for (var i = 0, len = localStorage.length; i < len; ++i ) {

  • DOM ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂåÖÂê´ÊçïËé∑ÔºàcaptureÔºâÂíåÂÜíÊ≥°ÔºàbubbleÔºâ‰∏§‰∏™Èò∂ÊÆµÔºöÊçïËé∑Èò∂ÊÆµ‰∫ã‰ª∂‰ªé window ÂºÄÂßãËß¶Âèë‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁÑ∂ÂêéÈÄöËøáÁ•ñÂÖàËäÇÁÇπ‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰º†ÈÄíÂà∞Ëß¶Âèë‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥†‰∏äÔºõÂÜíÊ≥°Èò∂ÊÆµ‰∫ã‰ª∂‰ªéÂàùÂßãÂÖÉÁ¥†‰æùÊ¨°ÂêëÁ•ñÂÖàËäÇÁÇπ‰º†ÈÄíÁõ¥Âà∞ window
  • Ê†áÂáÜ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁõëÂê¨ elem.addEventListener(type, handler, capture)/elem.removeEventListener(type, handler, capture)Ôºöhandler Êé•Êî∂‰øùÂ≠ò‰∫ã‰ª∂‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑ event ÂØπË±°‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºåevent.target ‰∏∫Ëß¶Âèë‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑÂØπË±°Ôºåhandler Ë∞ÉÁî®‰∏ä‰∏ãÊñá this ‰∏∫ÁªëÂÆöÁõëÂê¨Âô®ÁöÑÂØπË±°Ôºåevent.preventDefault()ÂèñÊ∂à‰∫ã‰ª∂ÈªòËÆ§Ë°å‰∏∫Ôºåevent.stopPropagation()/event.stopImmediatePropagation()ÂèñÊ∂à‰∫ã‰ª∂‰º†ÈÄí
  • ËÄÅÁâàÊú¨ IE ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁõëÂê¨ elem.attachEvent('on'+type, handler)/elem.detachEvent('on'+type, handler)Ôºöhandler ‰∏çÊé•Êî∂ event ‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºå‰∫ã‰ª∂‰ø°ÊÅØ‰øùÂ≠òÂú® window.event ‰∏≠ÔºåËß¶Âèë‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑÂØπË±°‰∏∫ event.srcElementÔºåhandler ÊâßË°å‰∏ä‰∏ãÊñá this ‰∏∫ window ‰ΩøÁî®Èó≠ÂåÖ‰∏≠Ë∞ÉÁî® handler.call(elem, event)ÂèØÊ®°‰ªøÊ†áÂáÜÊ®°ÂûãÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéËøîÂõûÈó≠ÂåÖÔºå‰øùËØÅ‰∫ÜÁõëÂê¨Âô®ÁöÑÁßªÈô§„ÄÇevent.returnValue ‰∏∫ false Êó∂ÂèñÊ∂à‰∫ã‰ª∂ÈªòËÆ§Ë°å‰∏∫Ôºåevent.cancleBubble ‰∏∫ true Êó∂ÂèñÊ∂àÊó∂Èó¥‰º†Êí≠
  • ÈÄöÂ∏∏Âà©Áî®‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂÜíÊ≥°Êú∫Âà∂ÊâòÁÆ°‰∫ã‰ª∂Â§ÑÁêÜÁ®ãÂ∫èÊèêÈ´òÁ®ãÂ∫èÊÄßËÉΩ„ÄÇ
/**
 * Ë∑®ÊµèËßàÂô®‰∫ã‰ª∂Â§ÑÁêÜÂ∑•ÂÖ∑„ÄÇÂè™ÊîØÊåÅÂÜíÊ≥°„ÄÇ‰∏çÊîØÊåÅÊçïËé∑
 * @author  (qiu_deqing@126.com)
 */

var EventUtil = {
    getEvent: function (event) {
        return event || window.event;
    },
    getTarget: function (event) {
        return event.target || event.srcElement;
    },
    // ËøîÂõûÊ≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÁöÑÁõëÂê¨Âô®ÔºåIE‰∏≠ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ËøîÂõûÂÄºÊù•ÁßªÈô§ÁõëÂê¨Âô®
    on: function (elem, type, handler) {
        if (elem.addEventListener) {
            elem.addEventListener(type, handler, false);
            return handler;
        } else if (elem.attachEvent) {
            var wrapper = function () {
              var event = window.event;
              event.target = event.srcElement;
              handler.call(elem, event);
            };
            elem.attachEvent('on' + type, wrapper);
            return wrapper;
        }
    },
    off: function (elem, type, handler) {
        if (elem.removeEventListener) {
            elem.removeEventListener(type, handler, false);
        } else if (elem.detachEvent) {
            elem.detachEvent('on' + type, handler);
        }
    },
    preventDefault: function (event) {
        if (event.preventDefault) {
            event.preventDefault();
        } else if ('returnValue' in event) {
            event.returnValue = false;
        }
    },
    stopPropagation: function (event) {
        if (event.stopPropagation) {
            event.stopPropagation();
        } else if ('cancelBubble' in event) {
            event.cancelBubble = true;
        }
    },
    /**
     * keypress‰∫ã‰ª∂Ë∑®ÊµèËßàÂô®Ëé∑ÂèñËæìÂÖ•Â≠óÁ¨¶
     * Êüê‰∫õÊµèËßàÂô®Âú®‰∏Ä‰∫õÁâπÊÆäÈîÆ‰∏ä‰πüËß¶ÂèëkeypressÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂ËøîÂõûnull
     **/
     getChar: function (event) {
        if (event.which == null) {
            return String.fromCharCode(event.keyCode);  // IE
        }
        else if (event.which != 0 && event.charCode != 0) {
            return String.fromCharCode(event.which);    // the rest
        }
        else {
            return null;    // special key
        }
     }
};

ËØ∑Áî®ÂéüÁîü js ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞,ÁªôÈ°µÈù¢Âà∂ÂÆöÁöÑ‰ªªÊÑè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈÄèÊòéÈÅÆÁΩ©(ÈÄèÊòéÂ∫¶ÂèØÂèò,ÈªòËÆ§ 0.2),‰ΩøËøô‰∏™Âå∫ÂüüÁÇπÂáªÊó†Êïà,Ë¶ÅÊ±ÇÂÖºÂÆπ IE8+ÂèäÂêÑ‰∏ªÊµÅÊµèËßàÂô®,ÈÅÆÁΩ©Â±ÇÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫:

<style>
#target {
    width: 200px;
    height: 300px;
    margin: 40px;
    background-color: tomato;
}
</style>

<div id="target"></div>

<script>
function addMask(elem, opacity) {
    opacity = opacity || 0.2;

    var rect = elem.getBoundingClientRect();
    var style = getComputedStyle(elem, null);

    var mask = document.createElement('div');
    mask.style.position = 'absolute';
    var marginLeft = parseFloat(style.marginLeft);
    mask.style.left = (elem.offsetLeft - marginLeft) + 'px';
    var marginTop = parseFloat(style.marginTop);
    mask.style.top = (elem.offsetTop - marginTop) + 'px';
    mask.style.zIndex = 9999;
    mask.style.opacity = '' + opacity;
    mask.style.backgroundColor = '#000';

    mask.style.width = (parseFloat(style.marginLeft) +
        parseFloat(style.marginRight) + rect.width) + 'px';
    mask.style.height = (parseFloat(style.marginTop) +
        parseFloat(style.marginBottom) + rect.height) + 'px';

    elem.parentNode.appendChild(mask);
}

var target = document.getElementById('target');
addMask(target);

target.addEventListener('click', function () {
    console.log('click');
}, false);
</script>

function Page() {}

Page.prototype = {
  constructor: Page,

  postA: function (a) {
    console.log('a:' + a);
  },
  postB: function (b) {
    console.log('b:' + b);
  },
  postC: function (c) {
    console.log('c:' + c);
  },
  check: function () {
    return Math.random() > 0.5;
  }
}

function checkfy(obj) {
  for (var key in obj) {
    if (key.indexOf('post') === 0 && typeof obj[key] === 'function') {
      (function (key) {
        var fn = obj[key];
        obj[key] = function () {
          if (obj.check()) {
            fn.apply(obj, arguments);
          }
        };
      }(key));
    }
  }
} // end checkfy()

checkfy(Page.prototype);

var obj = new Page();

obj.postA('checkfy');
obj.postB('checkfy');
obj.postC('checkfy');

ÁºñÂÜô javascript Ê∑±Â∫¶ÂÖãÈöÜÂáΩÊï∞ deepClone

function deepClone(obj) {
    var _toString = Object.prototype.toString;

    // null, undefined, non-object, function
    if (!obj || typeof obj !== 'object') {
        return obj;
    }

    // DOM Node
    if (obj.nodeType && 'cloneNode' in obj) {
        return obj.cloneNode(true);
    }

    // Date
    if (_toString.call(obj) === '[object Date]') {
        return new Date(obj.getTime());
    }

    // RegExp
    if (_toString.call(obj) === '[object RegExp]') {
        var flags = [];
        if (obj.global) { flags.push('g'); }
        if (obj.multiline) { flags.push('m'); }
        if (obj.ignoreCase) { flags.push('i'); }

        return new RegExp(obj.source, flags.join(''));
    }

    var result = Array.isArray(obj) ? [] :
        obj.constructor ? new obj.constructor() : {};

    for (var key in obj ) {
        result[key] = deepClone(obj[key]);
    }

    return result;
}

function A() {
    this.a = a;
}

var a = {
    name: 'qiu',
    birth: new Date(),
    pattern: /qiu/gim,
    container: document.body,
    hobbys: ['book', new Date(), /aaa/gim, 111]
};

var c = new A();
var b = deepClone(c);
console.log(c.a === b.a);
console.log(c, b);

Ë°•ÂÖÖ‰ª£Á†Å,Èº†Ê†áÂçïÂáª Button1 ÂêéÂ∞Ü Button1 ÁßªÂä®Âà∞ Button2 ÁöÑÂêéÈù¢

<!doctype html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>TEst</title>
</head>
<body>

<div>
   <input type="button" id ="button1" value="1" />
   <input type="button" id ="button2" value="2" />
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var btn1 = document.getElementById('button1');
    var btn2 = document.getElementById('button2');

    addListener(btn1, 'click', function (event) {
        btn1.parentNode.insertBefore(btn2, btn1);
    });

    function addListener(elem, type, handler) {
        if (elem.addEventListener) {
            elem.addEventListener(type, handler, false);
            return handler;
        } else if (elem.attachEvent) {
            function wrapper() {
                var event = window.event;
                event.target = event.srcElement;
                handler.call(elem, event);
            }
            elem.attachEvent('on' + type, wrapper);
            return wrapper;
        }
    }

</script>
</body>
</html>

ÁΩëÈ°µ‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ËÆ°ÁÆóÂΩìÂπ¥ËøòÂâ©Â§öÂ∞ëÊó∂Èó¥ÁöÑÂÄíÊï∞ËÆ°Êó∂Á®ãÂ∫è,Ë¶ÅÊ±ÇÁΩëÈ°µ‰∏äÂÆûÊó∂Âä®ÊÄÅÊòæÁ§∫"√ó√ó Âπ¥ËøòÂâ© √ó√ó Â§© √ó√ó Êó∂ √ó√ó ÂàÜ √ó√ó Áßí"

<!doctype html>
<html>

    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>TEst</title>
</head>
<body>

    <span id="target"></span>


<script type="text/javascript">
    // ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÁÆÄÂåñ„ÄÇÊØèÊúàÈªòËÆ§30Â§©
    function getTimeString() {
        var start = new Date();
        var end = new Date(start.getFullYear() + 1, 0, 1);
        var elapse = Math.floor((end - start) / 1000);

        var seconds = elapse % 60 ;
        var minutes = Math.floor(elapse / 60) % 60;
        var hours = Math.floor(elapse / (60 * 60)) % 24;
        var days = Math.floor(elapse / (60 * 60 * 24)) % 30;
        var months = Math.floor(elapse / (60 * 60 * 24 * 30)) % 12;
        var years = Math.floor(elapse / (60 * 60 * 24 * 30 * 12));

        return start.getFullYear() + 'Âπ¥ËøòÂâ©' + years + 'Âπ¥' + months + 'Êúà' + days + 'Êó•'
            + hours + 'Â∞èÊó∂' + minutes + 'ÂàÜ' + seconds + 'Áßí';
    }

    function domText(elem, text) {
        if (text == undefined) {

            if (elem.textContent) {
                return elem.textContent;
            } else if (elem.innerText) {
                return elem.innerText;
            }
        } else {
            if (elem.textContent) {
                elem.textContent = text;
            } else if (elem.innerText) {
                elem.innerText = text;
            } else {
                elem.innerHTML = text;
            }
        }
    }

    var target = document.getElementById('target');

    setInterval(function () {
        domText(target, getTimeString());
    }, 1000)
</script>

</body>
</html>

Â¶ÇÊûúÊµèËßàÂô®ÊîØÊåÅ Array.isArray()ÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Âà§Êñ≠Âê¶ÂàôÈúÄËøõË°åÂøÖË¶ÅÂà§Êñ≠

/**
 * Âà§Êñ≠‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂØπË±°ÊòØÂê¶ÊòØÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåÂèÇÊï∞‰∏çÊòØÂØπË±°ÊàñËÄÖ‰∏çÊòØÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåËøîÂõûfalse
 *
 * @param {Object} arg ÈúÄË¶ÅÊµãËØïÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Êï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÂØπË±°
 * @return {Boolean} ‰º†ÂÖ•ÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØÊï∞ÁªÑËøîÂõûtrueÔºåÂê¶ÂàôËøîÂõûfalse

function isArray(arg) {
    if (typeof arg === 'object') {
        return Object.prototype.toString.call(arg) === '[object Array]';
    }
    return false;
}

/**

 * ÁöÑtypeofËøîÂõû'function'ÔºåÈááÁî®ÈÄöÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂê¶ÂàôÈááÁî®‰ºòÂåñÊñπÊ≥ï
 *
 * @param {Any} arg ÈúÄË¶ÅÊ£ÄÊµãÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫ÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂØπË±°
 * @return {boolean} Â¶ÇÊûúÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåËøîÂõûtrueÔºåÂê¶Âàôfalse
 */
function isFunction(arg) {
    if (arg) {
        if (typeof (/./) !== 'function') {
            return typeof arg === 'function';
        } else {
            return Object.prototype.toString.call(arg) === '[object Function]';
        }
    } // end if
    return false;
}

ÁºñÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞Êé•Âèó url ‰∏≠ query string ‰∏∫ÂèÇÊï∞,ËøîÂõûËß£ÊûêÂêéÁöÑ Object,query string ‰ΩøÁî® application/x-www-form-urlencoded ÁºñÁ†Å

/**
 * Ëß£Êûêquery stringËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫ÂØπË±°Ôºå‰∏Ä‰∏™keyÊúâÂ§ö‰∏™ÂÄºÊó∂ÁîüÊàêÊï∞ÁªÑ
 *
 * @param {String} query ÈúÄË¶ÅËß£ÊûêÁöÑqueryÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÔºåÂºÄÂ§¥ÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØ?Ôºå
 * ÊåâÁÖßapplication/x-www-form-urlencodedÁºñÁ†Å
 * @return {Object} ÂèÇÊï∞Ëß£ÊûêÂêéÁöÑÂØπË±°
 */
function parseQuery(query) {
    var result = {};

    // Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÊòØÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËøîÂõûÁ©∫ÂØπË±°
    if (typeof query !== 'string') {
        return result;
    }

    // ÂéªÊéâÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂºÄÂ§¥ÂèØËÉΩÂ∏¶ÁöÑ?
    if (query.charAt(0) === '?') {
        query = query.substring(1);
    }

    var pairs = query.split('&');
    var pair;
    var key, value;
    var i, len;

    for (i = 0, len = pairs.length; i < len; ++i) {
        pair = pairs[i].split('=');
        // application/x-www-form-urlencodedÁºñÁ†Å‰ºöÂ∞Ü' 'ËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫+
        key = decodeURIComponent(pair[0]).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
        value = decodeURIComponent(pair[1]).replace(/\+/g, ' ');

        // Â¶ÇÊûúÊòØÊñ∞keyÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Ê∑ªÂä†
        if (!(key in result)) {
            result[key] = value;
        }
        // Â¶ÇÊûúkeyÂ∑≤ÁªèÂá∫Áé∞‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰ª•‰∏äÔºåÁõ¥Êé•ÂêëÊï∞ÁªÑÊ∑ªÂä†value
        else if (isArray(result[key])) {
            result[key].push(value);
        }
        // keyÁ¨¨‰∫åÊ¨°Âá∫Áé∞ÔºåÂ∞ÜÁªìÊûúÊîπ‰∏∫Êï∞ÁªÑ
        else {
            var arr = [result[key]];
            arr.push(value);
            result[key] = arr;
        } // end if-else
    } // end for

    return result;
}

function isArray(arg) {
    if (arg && typeof arg === 'object') {
        return Object.prototype.toString.call(arg) === '[object Array]';
    }
    return false;
}
/**
console.log(parseQuery('sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8'));
 */

Ëß£Êûê‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑ url,ËøîÂõû Object ÂåÖÂê´Âüü‰∏é window.location Áõ∏Âêå

/**
 * Ëß£Êûê‰∏Ä‰∏™urlÂπ∂ÁîüÊàêwindow.locationÂØπË±°‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´ÁöÑÂüü
 * location:
 * {
 *      href: 'ÂåÖÂê´ÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑurl',
 *      origin: 'ÂåÖÂê´ÂçèËÆÆÂà∞pathname‰πãÂâçÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ',
 *      protocol: 'url‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÂçèËÆÆÔºåÂåÖÂê´Êú´Â∞æÁöÑ:',
 *      username: 'Áî®Êà∑Âêç', // ÊöÇÊó∂‰∏çÊîØÊåÅ
 *      password: 'ÂØÜÁ†Å',  // ÊöÇÊó∂‰∏çÊîØÊåÅ
 *      host: 'ÂÆåÊï¥‰∏ªÊú∫ÂêçÔºåÂåÖÂê´:ÂíåÁ´ØÂè£',
 *      hostname: '‰∏ªÊú∫ÂêçÔºå‰∏çÂåÖÂê´Á´ØÂè£'
 *      port: 'Á´ØÂè£Âè∑',
 *      pathname: 'ÊúçÂä°Âô®‰∏äËÆøÈóÆËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑË∑ØÂæÑ/ÂºÄÂ§¥',
 *      search: 'query stringÔºå?ÂºÄÂ§¥',
 *      hash: '#ÂºÄÂ§¥ÁöÑfragment identifier'
 * }
 *
 * @param {string} url ÈúÄË¶ÅËß£ÊûêÁöÑurl
 * @return {Object} ÂåÖÂê´url‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÂØπË±°
 */
function parseUrl(url) {
    var result = {};
    var keys = ['href', 'origin', 'protocol', 'host',
                'hostname', 'port', 'pathname', 'search', 'hash'];
    var i, len;
    var regexp = /(([^:]+:)\/\/(([^:\/\?#]+)(:\d+)?))(\/[^?#]*)?(\?[^#]*)?(#.*)?/;

    var match = regexp.exec(url);

    if (match) {
        for (i = keys.length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
            result[keys[i]] = match[i] ? match[i] : '';
        }
    }

    return result;
}

ÂÆåÊàêÂáΩÊï∞ getViewportSize ËøîÂõûÊåáÂÆöÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑËßÜÂè£Â∞∫ÂØ∏

/**
* Êü•ËØ¢ÊåáÂÆöÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑËßÜÂè£Â∞∫ÂØ∏ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÊåáÂÆöÁ™óÂè£ÔºåÊü•ËØ¢ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£Â∞∫ÂØ∏
**/
function getViewportSize(w) {
    w = w || window;

    // IE9ÂèäÊ†áÂáÜÊµèËßàÂô®‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ΩøÁî®Ê≠§Ê†áÂáÜÊñπÊ≥ï
    if ('innerHeight' in w) {
        return {
            width: w.innerWidth,
            height: w.innerHeight
        };
    }

    var d = w.document;
    // IE 8Âèä‰ª•‰∏ãÊµèËßàÂô®Âú®Ê†áÂáÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏ã
    if (document.compatMode === 'CSS1Compat') {
        return {
            width: d.documentElement.clientWidth,
            height: d.documentElement.clientHeight
        };
    }

    // IE8Âèä‰ª•‰∏ãÊµèËßàÂô®Âú®ÊÄ™ÁôñÊ®°Âºè‰∏ã
    return {
        width: d.body.clientWidth,
        height: d.body.clientHeight
    };
}

ÂÆåÊàêÂáΩÊï∞ getScrollOffset ËøîÂõûÁ™óÂè£ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÂÅèÁßªÈáè

/**
 * Ëé∑ÂèñÊåáÂÆöwindow‰∏≠ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÁöÑÂÅèÁßªÈáèÔºåÂ¶ÇÊú™ÊåáÂÆöÂàôËé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçwindow
 * ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÂÅèÁßªÈáè
 *
 * @param {window} w ÈúÄË¶ÅËé∑ÂèñÊªöÂä®Êù°ÂÅèÁßªÈáèÁöÑÁ™óÂè£
 * @return {Object} obj.x‰∏∫Ê∞¥Âπ≥ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÂÅèÁßªÈáè,obj.y‰∏∫Á´ñÁõ¥ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÂÅèÁßªÈáè
 */
function getScrollOffset(w) {
    w =  w || window;
    // Â¶ÇÊûúÊòØÊ†áÂáÜÊµèËßàÂô®
    if (w.pageXOffset != null) {
        return {
            x: w.pageXOffset,
            y: w.pageYOffset
        };
    }

    // ËÄÅÁâàÊú¨IEÔºåÊ†πÊçÆÂÖºÂÆπÊÄß‰∏çÂêåËÆøÈóÆ‰∏çÂêåÂÖÉÁ¥†
    var d = w.document;
    if (d.compatMode === 'CSS1Compat') {
        return {
            x: d.documentElement.scrollLeft,
            y: d.documentElement.scrollTop
        }
    }

    return {
        x: d.body.scrollLeft,
        y: d.body.scrollTop
    };
}

Áé∞Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ richText,ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊÆµÂØåÊñáÊú¨,ÈúÄË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫Âú®È°µÈù¢‰∏ä.Êúâ‰∏™Ë¶ÅÊ±Ç,ÈúÄË¶ÅÁªôÂÖ∂‰∏≠Âè™ÂåÖÂê´‰∏Ä‰∏™ img ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑ p Ê†áÁ≠æÂ¢ûÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™Âè´ pic ÁöÑ class.ËØ∑ÁºñÂÜô‰ª£Á†ÅÂÆûÁé∞.ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® jQuery Êàñ KISSY.

function richText(text) {
    var div = document.createElement('div');
    div.innerHTML = text;
    var p = div.getElementsByTagName('p');
    var i, len;

    for (i = 0, len = p.length; i < len; ++i) {
        if (p[i].getElementsByTagName('img').length === 1) {
            p[i].classList.add('pic');
        }
    }

    return div.innerHTML;
}

ËØ∑ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ Event Á±ª,ÁªßÊâøËá™Ê≠§Á±ªÁöÑÂØπË±°ÈÉΩ‰ºöÊã•Êúâ‰∏§‰∏™ÊñπÊ≥ï on,off,once Âíå trigger

function Event() {
    if (!(this instanceof Event)) {
        return new Event();
    }
    this._callbacks = {};
}
Event.prototype.on = function (type, handler) {
    this_callbacks = this._callbacks || {};
    this._callbacks[type] = this.callbacks[type] || [];
    this._callbacks[type].push(handler);

    return this;
};

Event.prototype.off = function (type, handler) {
    var list = this._callbacks[type];

    if (list) {
        for (var i = list.length; i >= 0; --i) {
            if (list[i] === handler) {
                list.splice(i, 1);
            }
        }
    }

    return this;
};

Event.prototype.trigger = function (type, data) {
    var list = this._callbacks[type];

    if (list) {
        for (var i = 0, len = list.length; i < len; ++i) {
            list[i].call(this, data);
        }
    }
};

Event.prototype.once = function (type, handler) {
    var self = this;

    function wrapper() {
        handler.apply(self, arguments);
        self.off(type, wrapper);
    }
    this.on(type, wrapper);
    return this;
};

ÁºñÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞Â∞ÜÂàóË°®Â≠êÂÖÉÁ¥†È°∫Â∫èÂèçËΩ¨

<ul id="target">
    <li>1</li>
    <li>2</li>
    <li>3</li>
    <li>4</li>
</ul>

<script>
    var target = document.getElementById('target');
    var i;
    var frag = document.createDocumentFragment();

    for (i = target.children.length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
        frag.appendChild(target.children[i]);
    }
    target.appendChild(frag);
</script>

‰ª•‰∏ãÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑ‰ΩúÁî®ÊòØ?Á©∫ÁôΩÂå∫ÂüüÂ∫îËØ•Â°´ÂÜô‰ªÄ‰πà

// define
(function (window) {
    function fn(str) {
        this.str = str;
    }

    fn.prototype.format = function () {
        var arg = __1__;
        return this.str.replace(__2__, function (a, b) {
            return arg[b] || '';
        });
    };

    window.fn = fn;
})(window);

// use
(function () {
    var t = new fn('<p><a href="{0}">{1}</a><span>{2}</span></p>');
    console.log(t.format('http://www.alibaba.com', 'Alibaba', 'Welcome'));
})();

define ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÁ±ªÔºå‰ΩøÁî®{}‰Ωú‰∏∫ËΩ¨‰πâÊ†áËÆ∞Ôºå‰∏≠Èó¥ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óË°®Á§∫ÊõøÊç¢ÁõÆÊ†áÔºåformat ÂÆûÂèÇÁî®Êù•ÊõøÊç¢Ê®°ÊùøÂÜÖÊ†áËÆ∞ Ê®™Á∫øÂ§ÑÂ°´Ôºö

  1. Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 0)
  2. /\{\s*(\d+)\s*\}/g

ÁºñÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞ÂÆûÁé∞ form ÁöÑÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ(Âç≥Â∞Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë°®Âçï‰∏≠ÁöÑÈîÆÂÄºÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ‰∏∫ÂèØÊèê‰∫§ÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤)

<form id="target">
    <select name="age">
        <option value="aaa">aaa</option>
        <option value="bbb" selected>bbb</option>
    </select>
    <select name="friends" multiple>
        <option value="qiu" selected>qiu</option>
        <option value="de">de</option>
        <option value="qing" selected>qing</option>
    </select>
    <input name="name" value="qiudeqing">
    <input type="password" name="password" value="11111">
    <input type="hidden" name="salery" value="3333">
    <textarea name="description">description</textarea>
    <input type="checkbox" name="hobby" checked value="football">Football
    <input type="checkbox" name="hobby" value="basketball">Basketball
    <input type="radio" name="sex" checked value="Female">Female
    <input type="radio" name="sex" value="Male">Male
</form>


<script>

/**
 * Â∞Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë°®ÂçïÂÖÉÁ¥†Â∫èÂàóÂåñ‰∏∫ÂèØÊèê‰∫§ÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤
 *
 * @param {FormElement} form ÈúÄË¶ÅÂ∫èÂàóÂåñÁöÑË°®ÂçïÂÖÉÁ¥†
 * @return {string} Ë°®ÂçïÂ∫èÂàóÂåñÂêéÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤
 */
function serializeForm(form) {
  if (!form || form.nodeName.toUpperCase() !== 'FORM') {
    return;
  }

  var result = [];

  var i, len;
  var field, fieldName, fieldType;

  for (i = 0, len = form.length; i < len; ++i) {
    field = form.elements[i];
    fieldName = field.name;
    fieldType = field.type;

    if (field.disabled || !fieldName) {
      continue;
    } // enf if

    switch (fieldType) {
      case 'text':
      case 'password':
      case 'hidden':
      case 'textarea':
        result.push(encodeURIComponent(fieldName) + '=' +
            encodeURIComponent(field.value));
        break;

      case 'radio':
      case 'checkbox':
        if (field.checked) {
          result.push(encodeURIComponent(fieldName) + '=' +
            encodeURIComponent(field.value));
        }
        break;

      case 'select-one':
      case 'select-multiple':
        for (var j = 0, jLen = field.options.length; j < jLen; ++j) {
          if (field.options[j].selected) {
            result.push(encodeURIComponent(fieldName) + '=' +
              encodeURIComponent(field.options[j].value || field.options[j].text));
          }
        } // end for
        break;

      case 'file':
      case 'submit':
        break; // ÊòØÂê¶Â§ÑÁêÜÔºü

      default:
        break;
    } // end switch
  } // end for

    return result.join('&');
}

var form = document.getElementById('target');
console.log(serializeForm(form));
</script>

‰ΩøÁî®ÂéüÁîü javascript Áªô‰∏ãÈù¢ÂàóË°®‰∏≠ÁöÑ li ËäÇÁÇπÁªëÂÆöÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂,ÁÇπÂáªÊó∂ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ Object ÂØπË±°,ÂÖºÂÆπ IE ÂíåÊ†áÂáÜÊµèËßàÂô®

<ul id="nav">
    <li><a href="http://11111">111</a></li>
    <li><a href="http://2222">222</a></li>
    <li><a href="http://333">333</a></li>
    <li><a href="http://444">444</a></li>
</ul>

Object:
{
    "index": 1,
    "name": "111",
    "link": "http://1111"
}

script:

var EventUtil = {
    getEvent: function (event) {
        return event || window.event;
    },
    getTarget: function (event) {
        return event.target || event.srcElement;
    },
    // ËøîÂõûÊ≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÁöÑÁõëÂê¨Âô®ÔºåIE‰∏≠ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ËøîÂõûÂÄºÊù•ÁßªÈô§ÁõëÂê¨Âô®
    on: function (elem, type, handler) {
        if (elem.addEventListener) {
            elem.addEventListener(type, handler, false);
            return handler;
        } else if (elem.attachEvent) {
            function wrapper(event) {
                return handler.call(elem, event);
            };
            elem.attachEvent('on' + type, wrapper);
            return wrapper;
        }
    },
    off: function (elem, type, handler) {
        if (elem.removeEventListener) {
            elem.removeEventListener(type, handler, false);
        } else if (elem.detachEvent) {
            elem.detachEvent('on' + type, handler);
        }
    },
    preventDefault: function (event) {
        if (event.preventDefault) {
            event.preventDefault();
        } else if ('returnValue' in event) {
            event.returnValue = false;
        }
    },
    stopPropagation: function (event) {
        if (event.stopPropagation) {
            event.stopPropagation();
        } else if ('cancelBubble' in event) {
            event.cancelBubble = true;
        }
    }
};
var DOMUtil = {
    text: function (elem) {
        if ('textContent' in elem) {
            return elem.textContent;
        } else if ('innerText' in elem) {
            return elem.innerText;
        }
    },
    prop: function (elem, propName) {
        return elem.getAttribute(propName);
    }
};

var nav = document.getElementById('nav');

EventUtil.on(nav, 'click', function (event) {
    var event = EventUtil.getEvent(event);
    var target = EventUtil.getTarget(event);

    var children = this.children;
    var i, len;
    var anchor;
    var obj = {};

    for (i = 0, len = children.length; i < len; ++i) {
        if (children[i] === target) {
            obj.index = i + 1;
            anchor = target.getElementsByTagName('a')[0];
            obj.name = DOMUtil.text(anchor);
            obj.link = DOMUtil.prop(anchor, 'href');
        }
    }

    alert('index: ' + obj.index + ' name: ' + obj.name +
        ' link: ' + obj.link);
});

Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ßÊï∞ÁªÑ,var a = ['1', '2', '3', ...];a ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÊòØ 100,ÂÜÖÂÆπÂ°´ÂÖÖÈöèÊú∫Êï¥Êï∞ÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤.ËØ∑ÂÖàÊûÑÈÄ†Ê≠§Êï∞ÁªÑ a,ÁÑ∂ÂêéËÆæËÆ°‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂ÂÜÖÂÆπÂéªÈáç

    /**
    * Êï∞ÁªÑÂéªÈáç
    **/
    function normalize(arr) {
        if (arr && Array.isArray(arr)) {
            var i, len, map = {};
            for (i = arr.length; i >= 0; --i) {
                if (arr[i] in map) {
                    arr.splice(i, 1);
                } else {
                    map[arr[i]] = true;
                }
            }
        }
        return arr;
    }

    /**
    * Áî®100‰∏™ÈöèÊú∫Êï¥Êï∞ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Â°´ÂÖÖÊï∞ÁªÑ„ÄÇ
    **/
    function fillArray(arr, start, end) {
        start = start == undefined ? 1 : start;
        end = end == undefined ?  100 : end;

        if (end <= start) {
            end = start + 100;
        }

        var width = end - start;
        var i;
        for (i = 100; i >= 1; --i) {
            arr.push('' + (Math.floor(Math.random() * width) + start));
        }
        return arr;
    }

    var input = [];
    fillArray(input, 1, 100);
    input.sort(function (a, b) {
        return a - b;
    });
    console.log(input);

    normalize(input);
    console.log(input);
